dmca.title: Cape Shrouds Crawford's Blog
dmca.body: This firm represents Cape Publications, Inc. d/b/a The Courier-Journal and its reporter, Byron Crawford. We have discovered that you are illegaly using Mr. Crawford's name and photograph on your web-site, byroncrawford.com. The purpose of this letter is to demand that you immediately cease and desist from any further use of Mr. Crawford's name or image. Your intentional use of Mr. Crawford's name and image is actionable under Kentucky and Federal law. Specifically, it is defamatory, depicts Mr. Crawford in a false light before the public, is a gross misappropriation of Mr. Crawford's name and likeness, and constitutes copyright infringement. There is no question that you are attempting to represent yourself as our client, and that effort is actionable. Please confirm that you will immediately remove Mr. Crawford's photograph from your website. If you do not, we will take appropriate legal action in Kentucky, which action will seek appropriate damages, costs and our attorneys' fees, all to be assessed against you.
